rules_text:
Choose two –
• Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature.
• Target player searches their library for up to two basic land cards. That player reveals those cards, puts one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into their hand, then shuffles.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.
• Target player gains 5 life.
notes:
:: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature.
• Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
• Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control.
• You gain 5 life.
